cause.description:
Texas Death Penalty Education and Resource Center is a statewide organization that facilitates coalition work to abolish the death penalty, both nationally with the group "Students Against the Death Penalty" and in Texas with several state-based organizations, including "Texas Students Against the Death Penalty", "Texas Moratorium Network", "Texas Death Penalty Abolition Movement", the Austin Chapter of "Campaign to End the Death Penalty", "Kids Against the Death Penalty" and the "March to Abolish the Death Penalty Coalition".
Students Against the Death Penalty is the first student-run non profit national organization that works to to end the death penalty through campaigns of public education and the promotion of youth activism.
SADP is sponsor of the award winning annual Anti-Death Penalty Alternative Spring Break, which was featured on MTV's Total Request Live. SADP coordinates communications and organizing between student groups around the US and other countries such as Iran.
You can fan SADP's facebook page at: http://www.facebook.com/stopexecutions
